name: Color Pinball
description:
A pinball where you control the walls to prevent the ball from falling.

You have 5 lives to overcome 3 levels in which the ball will not stop.

Use a key to activate a color. All the walls of that color will be activated and the others will be deactivated.

Collect all 10 items to advance to the next level.

Beat all 3 levels to win.
